org.apache.twill.kafka.client

Interface KafkaConsumer.Preparer

  • Enclosing interface:
    KafkaConsumer

    public static interface KafkaConsumer.Preparer
    A builder for preparing message consumption.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KafkaConsumer.Preparer add(String topic, int partition, long offset)
      Consumes messages from a given offset.
      KafkaConsumer.Preparer addFromBeginning(String topic, int partition)
      Consumes messages from the earliest message available.
      KafkaConsumer.Preparer addLatest(String topic, int partition)
      Consumes messages from the latest message.
      Cancellable consume(KafkaConsumer.MessageCallback callback)
      Starts the consumption as being configured by this KafkaConsumer.Preparer.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        KafkaConsumer.Preparer add(String topic,
                         int partition,
                         long offset)
        Consumes messages from a given offset. If the given offset is invalid, it'll start consuming from the latest offset.
        Parameters:
        topic - Topic to consume from.
        partition - Partition in the topic to consume from.
        offset - Offset to starts with.
        Returns:
        This KafkaConsumer.Preparer instance.

      • addFromBeginning

        KafkaConsumer.Preparer addFromBeginning(String topic,
                                      int partition)
        Consumes messages from the earliest message available.
        Parameters:
        topic - Topic to consume from.
        partition - Partition in the topic to consume from.
        Returns:
        This KafkaConsumer.Preparer instance.

      • addLatest

        KafkaConsumer.Preparer addLatest(String topic,
                               int partition)
        Consumes messages from the latest message.
        Parameters:
        topic - Topic to consume from.
        partition - Partition in the topic to consume from.
        Returns:
        This KafkaConsumer.Preparer instance.

      • consume

        Cancellable consume(KafkaConsumer.MessageCallback callback)
        Starts the consumption as being configured by this KafkaConsumer.Preparer.
        Parameters:
        callback - The KafkaConsumer.MessageCallback for receiving new messages.
        Returns:
        A Cancellable for cancelling message consumption.
